name: BORGWARNER INC.
sampleDescriptions:
-General interest in Corporate Average Fuel Economy (CAFE) and Greenhouse Gas emissions (GHG) standards.
-General interest in automotive research and development, including the Vehicle Innovation Act
-General issues relating to federal tax reform; HR 1, Tax Cuts and Jobs Act of 2017.
-Matters related to trade, including the North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), Sec. 232, and Sec. 301.
